name: Hag, Pesta
description: A Medium Fey hag known for her chaotic nature and abilities centered around disease and pestilence.
memorable: Her ability to pinpoint sick creatures and spread a variety of diseases makes her a dangerous foe.
goals: To spread disease and chaos among creatures.
relations: Often associated with other hags or creatures that thrive in sickness and decay.
environment: Typically found in swamps, dark forests, or anywhere pathogens thrive.
strengths: She can inflict disease with her Pestilence Aura and is immune to diseases herself.
attacks: Uses Pestilence Rake and Poison Bolt to deal piercing and poison damage, potentially causing diseases.
most_powerful_ability: The Pestilence Aura damages nearby creatures and can inflict debilitating diseases.
senses: Possesses darkvision and a passive perception of 15, aiding her in locating hidden creatures.
skills: She has a +3 in Perception, allowing her to notice subtle movements and hidden threats.
additional_information: Can heal allies with Curative Touch, restoring hit points and curing diseases.
Summons rat swarms that act as allies, spreading further disease.
Highly durable due to her strong Constitution and natural armor.
Displays unpredictability in her chaotic actions, making her difficult to predict.
Possesses a powerful combination of melee and ranged attacks.
test_queries: hag that spreads diseases and pestilence
medium fey with deadly disease abilities
pestilence aura that harms nearby creatures
hag immune to diseases and uses rat swarms
chaotic neutral hag known for poison attacks
